Time Bomb was slammed into a tree by the smalled Rizopas. Stronghold had al=
ready thrown Land Mine all around in circles. Land Mine struggled to get aw=
ay, but it was futile. Blender beat on Time Bomb for a while, and a while l=
ater, the Explosive couple were injured terminally.

"Fun is fun!" Blender =
said. He threw Time Bomb to the ground. Stronghold and Rizopas both pinned =
Land Mine and beat her severely. Blender's saw blade pops out of his arm an=
d he slices the arm from a struggling Time Bomb. He starts an operation, cu=
tting Time Bomb open and spilling his mech fluid and innards across the gre=
en field, making it the color... (Blue? Red? What color is Mech Fluid? I al=
ways assumed it was red, because it would make more sense and Scavenger fro=
m Beast Machines has red on his claws, which could be mech fluid indeed!) T=
ime Bomb's scream echoed through the area as Blender continued to slice him=
 apart. Land Mine was beaten by Stronghold and Rizopas. Blender finishes hi=
s gutting and leans up against a tree. Stronghold and Rizopas lift Land Min=
e into the air, and both of them push Land Mine into the tree branch belly =
first, the branch emerging from the lower back of Land Mine. She just hung =
there bleeding now. Stronghold, Rizopas, and Blender started to smoke cigar=
s now, Rizopas coughing with every breath.

"See you later." Stronghold sai=
d. The 3 start to walk away. Land Mine activates her commlink.

"KitKat...h=
elp." Land Mine says into it to KitKat. She looks at Time Bomb, or what was=
 left of him and she cries...
